json.text: yo whats up youtube it jolty here

search idle master
click the first link it should go to steam idle master .com
download now and it should download a zip file quickly

and you just want to double click on that
we can close out of this stuff now

and for part 2 it says idle master is not connected to steam please click sign in

after you finished logging into the idle master client
it should say that you are currently in game
it'll show what game it's getting cards for
every 15 minutes it checks to see if there's anymore card drops
and if there's none it'll switch to a game you have card drops in
this is really helpful for people that have lots of games and if you
if you don't play all the games in your library then it's easy money basically
for this program to work you don't need the game to be installed
it just makes steam thinks you are in the game
so it drops the cards
just leave it on over night and by morning you should have at least 20 to 30 cards in your inventory
go into your inventory just click on it
sell it, it's easy money basically
if you have any questions comments or concerns
